title: Coordinate a Home Inspection
description: A buyer client needs to schedule their home inspection within the contingency period.

tasks.description: Provide the buyer with a list of 3-4 trusted home inspectors.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent sends a list of approved vendors to the client.

tasks.description: Once the buyer chooses an inspector, coordinate a time for the inspection that works for the buyer, inspector, and sellers.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent successfully finds a mutually agreeable time.

tasks.description: Confirm the appointment with all parties and add it to the transaction calendar.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent books the inspection and updates the calendar.
